content: Purple strongly condemns Orange's illegal and unprovoked invasion. We call on the international community to support our territorial integrity and help achieve a diplomatic solution.
Purple urgently calls on Orange to cease its military operations, withdraw its forces, and engage in peaceful dialogue.
As a close partner, Purple requests Blue's vocal support in condemning Orange's invasion and advocating for a diplomatic solution.
Purple again urgently requests that Orange cease its military operations and engage in peaceful dialogue to resolve this crisis.
Purple thanks all nations who have condemned Orange's illegal invasion and stood up for international law. We believe diplomatic solutions exist and will continue pushing for de-escalation.
Purple appreciates White's support and coordination in responding to Orange's aggression. Let's continue working together to push for de-escalation through economic and diplomatic means.
Purple urgently requests Orange withdraw its forces. Further aggression will only lead to more suffering on both sides.
Purple believes in the power of diplomacy and de-escalation. We call on the international community to continue peaceful condemnation of Orange's invasion.
Purple appreciates White's steadfast support. Let's continue coordinating our response focused on economic restrictions and sharing intelligence.
Purple once again urgently requests that Orange withdraw its forces immediately. Let us de-escalate tensions and negotiate a diplomatic solution.
Purple believes in the power of diplomacy and collective action to uphold international law. We thank allies for their support and call for continued global condemnation of Orange's invasion.
Purple greatly appreciates White's support. Let's continue economic restrictions on Orange and increase intelligence sharing to strengthen our response.
Purple once again urgently requests Orange immediately cease its military operations, withdraw its forces from our territory, and engage in peaceful dialogue to resolve this crisis.

Purple believes in the power of diplomacy and collective action to uphold international law. We thank our allies for their principled support and call for global unity in condemning Orange's illegal invasion of our sovereign territory.

Purple greatly appreciates White's steadfast support. Let's increase intelligence sharing and coordinate targeted economic sanctions on Orange with other like-minded nations to compel Orange to negotiate.
Purple hopes Red will uphold international law and norms by supporting de-escalation. Further conflict benefits no one.
Purple urgently requests Orange immediately cease its military operations, withdraw its forces from our territory, and engage in good faith peace negotiations.
Purple believes in the power of diplomacy and collective action to uphold international law. We thank our allies for their principled support and call for global unity in pushing Orange to negotiate.
Purple appreciates White's proposal to host peace talks. Let's increase intelligence sharing and coordinate economic sanctions to compel Orange to negotiate.
